New_Rochelle.Yonkers High School:
Yonkers High School is located in Yonkers, New York, US, and offers the International Baccalaureate program of studies.
Yonkers High School was ranked the 24th best American high school and the 4th best New York State high school in 2012 by U.S. News & World Report. Yonkers High School offers Advanced Placement courses and participates in the International Baccalaureate program.
